title: Using Expected Values
text: To calculate how many games it will take to reach ten points, we can use the equation: $$10$$ $$=$$ $$E[X] n$$, where E[X] is the expected points from one game and $$n$$ is the amount of games it will take two reach ten points. Solving for $$n$$ will give us the correct solution.
